April 2023

Welcome to Your Justia Insights Newsletter 

Welcome to a special edition of Justia Insights as we kick off our 20th anniversary! It has been a great two decades of equipping lawyers with the tools to achieve their goals and bringing the public greater access to free legal information.

In this edition of Justia Insights, you can also check out the latest updates for our Justia Connect community, including our fourth-quarter Justia Ask A Lawyer statistics, the latest Google LSAs updates, and more! Plus, you can check out some of the Pros and Cons of ChatGPT for lawyers in the Tip of the Month and explore the latest news in law and technology picked directly for you by our team.

Justia Free Resources: The Justia U.S. Supreme Court Center

The U.S. Supreme Court profoundly influences our society. To many, it is both familiar and opaque. In this post, we're exploring the newly redesigned Justia U.S. Supreme Court Center, a free resource shedding light on the highest tribunal in the nation.

March 2023 Google Broad Core Algorithm Update Is Now Rolling Out

In keeping with their traditional updates, Google recently confirmed and began rolling out a new algorithm change. These important updates can have significant implications for search rankings. Keep reading to learn more!

Justia Legal Guides: Health Care Law Center

Complex laws and regulations govern health care, to which access has expanded in recent years. The Justia Health Care Law Center provides consumers with free information about their rights in this area.

  

Featured Webinar

Effective Digital & Traditional Marketing for Small Law Firms

Join Justia and guest speaker David Wolf for a webinar presentation to help law firms promote their brands and secure more clients! In a competitive digital and traditional media environment, it seems that solo attorneys and small firms have no chance to create an impactful brand that brings in business. But with the right message, marketing partners, network, and effort, you can promote your firm and brand without breaking the bank. If you have a limited budget and the time and inclination to grow your client base, this seminar is for you.

Law Students Visit

Recently, our Justia Mexico office hosted a group of law students from La Salle University (ULSA). We offered them an office tour, coffee break, and presentation all about Justia. We always enjoy sharing information about Justia with students!

A Pugâ€™s Tale

Meet Ziggy!

Ziggy is a 5 month old bouncy and adorable puppy! Ziggy is very clumsy - he always seems to be tripping over his own paws and bumping into things. Ziggy is always eager to play and explore and he loves chasing after his ball. Even though he may not be the most graceful pup around, his boundless energy and affectionate personality more than make up for it.
